title: Energy Quantum Theory (EQT)
description: Core theoretical framework for Energy Quantum Theory (EQT), unifying fundamental forces through energy quanta density fields. This project primarily consists of documentation (licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0) with supporting software (licensed under MIT).
notes: Documentation is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0; supporting software is licensed under MIT. See README.md or LICENSE files for details. DOI is pending, check repository for updates.
